00032 int ResponseCallbackExists::response(bool exists) {
00033   m_header_builder.initialize_from_request(m_event_ptr->header);
00034   CommBufPtr cbp(new CommBuf(m_header_builder, 5));
00035   cbp->append_i32(Error::OK);
00036   cbp->append_bool(exists);
00037   return m_comm->send_response(m_event_ptr->addr, cbp);
